body.p: The amendment in paragraph 102Z1 of IAS 39 applies to different set of instruments from the Phase 1 exception. For items within the scope of paragraph 102Z1 of IAS 39, the separately identifiable requirement has never been satisfied. In contrast, the population of hedging relationships to which the Phase 1 relief applied had already satisfied the qualifying criteria for hedge accounting to be applied. The Board therefore considered that any relief from the separately identifiable requirement in Phase 2 should be temporary.
